data.name: ImportInstructionsText
data.value: To import ROM from OneDrive: 1. Upload ROMs to your OneDrive folder. 2. Tap "Sign in" to sign in into OneDrive 3. Tap "Import" and choose the ROM.

data.name: NotSignedInError
data.value: You are not signed in. Sign in first to import ROMs from SkyDrive.

data.name: AboutSnes9x
data.value:
Feel free to report any bugs or broken games.
The author is not responsible for any illegal use of this software. Furthermore, there is no warranty for this software and the author is not liable for any damages.
Credits: - Eddi Bento for logo design. - MOGA company for the surprised gift.

data.name: AboutSnes9xLicenseText
data.value:
Permission to use, copy, modify and/or distribute Snes9x in both binary and source form, for non-commercial purposes, is hereby granted without fee, providing that this license information and copyright notice appear with all copies and any derived work.
This software is provided 'as-is', without any express or implied warranty. In no event shall the authors be held liable for any damages arising from the use of this software or it's derivatives.
Snes9x is freeware for PERSONAL USE only. Commercial users should seek permission of the copyright holders first. Commercial use includes, but is not limited to, charging money for Snes9x or software derived from Snes9x, including Snes9x or derivatives in commercial game bundles, and/or using Snes9x as a promotion for your commercial product.
The copyright holders request that bug fixes and improvements to the code should be forwarded to them so everyone can benefit from the modifications in future versions.
Super NES and Super Nintendo Entertainment System are trademarks of Nintendo Co., Limited and its subsidiary companies.

data.name: RenameEmptyString
data.value: You must enter a name for the ROM.

data.value: A ROM with that name already exists.

data.value: Change the displayed name of the ROM:

data.name: ROMAlreadyExistingError
data.value: That ROM has been downloaded before: {0}

data.name: BackupErrorUpload
data.value: Error while uploading a file: {0}. Try to sign out from OneDrive and sign back in if this error persists.

data.name: BackupInstructions
data.value: Choose the game to export saves.

data.name: BackupWaitForUpload
data.value: Please wait for the upload to complete.

data.name: CreateBackupFolderError
data.value: Error while creating the backup folder.

data.name: MaximumTilesPinned
data.value: The selected ROM is pinned already or you have reached the maximum number of tiles to pin.

data.name: FileAssociationError
data.value: Error importing and opening ROM file.

data.name: ImportSavestateInvalidFormat
data.value: Savestate file format is invalid. The file name must end with a number from 0 to 9 (e.g. demo0.sgm).

data.name: TileOpenError
data.value: Error opening the ROM associated with the tile.

data.name: SkyDriveInternetLost
data.value: Cannot connect to OneDrive. Check your internet connection.

data.name: BuyNowText
data.value: This feature is only available in the full version of the app. Click on the Ok button below, if you want to buy the app and unlock the feature.

data.name: BuyNowImportText
data.value: In the trial version you can store up to 2 ROMs on your phone. Click on Ok to buy the app and remove this limit.

data.name: BuyWaitForDownloadText
data.value: Please wait for the active download to complete.

data.name: HelpImportEmailText
data.value: Send an E-Mail to any E-Mail address that is accessible from your phone, containing one or more ROM(s) as file attachments. You can either attach the ROMs as *.smc or *.sfc files or contained within a *.zip archive. Open the E-Mail on your phone and tap on the attachment to download the file. If your attachment was a *.zip archive, the E-Mail client allows you to navigate through the archive. Locate the ROM inside the archive and tap on it to launch the emulator. The emulator will automatically import the ROM from the E-Mail attachment and start the game. If the attachment was not a *.zip archive but a *.smc or *.sfc file, just tap on it to start the emulator and import the ROM.

data.name: HelpImportSkyDriveText
data.value: Store your ROMs in a folder on your OneDrive. Afterwards navigate to the OneDrive section on the main page of the emulator (swipe left from the ROM list). If you are not signed in yet, click on "Sign in" first and enter your credentials if you are asked for it. When you are signed in, click on the button labeled "import ROMs" on the emulators main page. The following page allows you to navigate through OneDrive to locate the folder where you put your ROMs into. In the folder containing the ROMs, tap on any *.gba or *.zip file to start the download. Wait for the download to complete before you leave the page. A confirmation message will be shown when the download is completed. Note: In some cases, ROMs downloaded from OneDrive only show a blank screen when started. If you experience this issue, please use alternative 2 or 3.

data.name: HelpImportWebText
data.value: In your web browser, open any web site that offers ROM downloads and start the download of the desired game. If the download was a *.zip archive, the browser allows you to navigate through the archive when the download is done. Locate the *.smc or *.sfc file contained in the archive and tap on it to start the emulator. The emulator will automatically import the ROM you downloaded using your web browser. If the downloaded file was a *.smc or *.sfc file, just tap on it and the emulator will start and import the ROM.

data.name: HelpIssuesWhiteScreenText
data.value: - Make sure the downloads are completed before you leave the OneDrive import page (wait for confirmation message). If you leave too early, the ROMs may remain in a corrupted state and cannot load correctly. If this happens, delete them (tap and hold in the ROM list) and re-download. - If OneDrive import does not work or ROMs imported from OneDrive don't work in general, try other methods to import ROMs. There are 3 methods of importing ROMs (OneDrive, E-Mail, Web Browser) described in the "how to" section of this page. - Don't forget to delete the ROMs that don't work before you re-import them using another method.

data.name: HelpIssuesWhiteScreenTextContact
data.value: - If nothing helps, contact the developer:

data.name: HelpTIpsPerformanceText
data.value: - Open the video settings and increase the value of the option "Skip Frames (same emulation speed)". This option reduces the number of frames the emulator needs to display and therefore leaves more resources to keep the emulation speed up. The games might appear less smooth when increasing the frame skip value. - Open the sound settings and switch off audio synchronization. This might increase the performance, but the sound quality may suffer. - Open the sound settings and switch the sound completely off.

data.name: HelpTipsSoundText
data.value: - Open the sound settings and switch on audio synchronization. This might increase the audio quality, but the performance may suffer. - If the emulation speed is too low, the sound quality can also suffer. Follow the above tips for games that are running slowly.

data.name: HelpTipsTurboText
data.value: - Press the camera button to toggle turbo mode. - Half-press the camera button to activate turbo mode while holding the camera button half-pressed.

data.name: ImportWaitComplete
data.value: Please wait for the download to complete.

data.name: RomListTroubleshootNote
data.value: Note: If your ROMs do not start, see the "issues" section of the help page.

data.name: ConfirmLoadText
data.value: Are you sure you want to load the last saved state?

data.name: ConfirmSaveText
data.value: Are you sure you want to save? This will overwrite the selected save state.

data.name: CheatsDescription
data.value: You can enter GameShark and CodeBreaker codes for GBA games and GameShark and GameGenie codes for GB/GBC games.

data.name: CheatInvalidFormat
data.value: Invalid code format. The codes must be 6, 8, 9, 12 or 16 hexadecimal values per line.

data.name: CheatNoCodeEntered
data.value: You must enter a code first.

data.name: CheatNoSelection
data.value: You must select a cheat code first.

data.name: CheatInvalidFormat2
data.value: Invalid code format. The codes must be in the format XXX-XXX-XXX, XXX-XXX or an 8 digit hexadecimal number per line.

data.name: RemoveStateNoSelection
data.value: You must select a save state first.

data.name: ManageDeleteUnknownError
data.value: There was an unknown error while removing the save state.

data.name: SRAMDeletedSuccessfully
data.value: Save file has been removed successfully.

data.name: EmailSubjectText
data.value: Snes8x bug report or feature suggestion

data.name: ImportSaveInstructionsText
data.value: To restore saves: 1. Make sure the names of the rom and the save file match exactly. 2. Tap "Import" and choose the save file. 3. Start the game.

data.name: RestartPromptText
data.value: Please restart the app (hit back button several times) for the new setting to take effect.

data.name: ShowLastPlayedGameText
data.value: Show snapshot of last played game

data.name: SecondGameText
data.value: second game (can be the same as first game)

data.name: Err_BluetoothOff
data.value: Bluetooth is turned off. To see the current Bluetooth settings tap 'ok'.

data.name: Err_NoChatName
data.value: Please enter a name to join.

data.name: Err_NoMessageToSend
data.value: Please enter a message to send.

data.value: You must select a peer from the list.

data.name: Err_NoPeerConnected
data.value: You are not connected to a Peer.

data.name: Msg_ChatPrompt
data.value: Do you want to link with {0}?

data.name: Msg_FoundPeers
data.value: Peers found: {0}. Tap 'refresh peers' to update.

data.name: Msg_NoPeers
data.value: No peers found. Tap 'refresh peers' to update.

data.name: NoMatchingNameText
data.value: Please make sure the name of the save file matches the name of the ROM

data.name: SDCardReadOnlyText
data.value: Note: SD card is read-only to developers. Handling of .zip extension is reserved by the OS, please use .zib for your zip files.

data.name: CheatsDescription2
data.value: NOTE: Due to a recent bug fix, all existing 16-character cheat codes have to be *edited* with proper space to work again.

data.name: EmulatorMenuText
data.value: Note: Emulator Menu function will be implemented at a later date.

data.name: PleaseWaitROMLoadingText
data.value: Please wait until ROM finishes loading

data.name: ErrorNoConnectionText
data.value: Error! No Internet connection or Microsoft server error. Please try again later.

data.name: HostIPAddressText
data.value: Host's IP address: {0}. Waiting for client...

data.name: LinkConnectedText
data.value: Connected. You can now close this window and continue playing game.

data.name: LinkErrorText
data.value: Error occured. Please restart the app and try again.

data.name: MogaGDR3Note
data.value: Note: MOGA controller may require GDR3.

data.name: ProductNotAvailableText
data.value: Product is not available at the moment.

data.name: PurchaseSuccessNoAdsText
data.value: Purchase successful, ads will not be shown the next time you start the app.

data.name: SDCardMissingText
data.value: The SD card is missing. Insert an SD card try again.

data.name: StartServerOtherText
data.value: Start server on the other device to get server's IP address.

data.name: TapMogaInstructionText
data.value: Tap here for MOGA controller instruction

data.name: TapStartServerIPText
data.value: Tap Start server to get the server IP address.

data.name: ValidCodeText
data.value: Code accepted. Please restart the app for the code to take effect.

data.name: HelpImportSDCardText
data.value: In the data tab of the main page, click on Import from SD card and follow the instruction

data.name: CloudSixInstructionText
data.value: Install one of Rudy Huyn's CloudSix apps to use this function.

data.name: ReviewPromptText
data.value: Please spend a few seconds rating the app. Good reviews keep new features coming.

data.name: AutoSaveWarning
data.value: WARNING: only check this box if you use quick save function. Your game saves may be wiped if you relies on in-game save function. Do you want to continue?

data.name: CloudSixOneFileLimitText
data.value: CloudSix only supports exporting one file at a time unless you choose "Export as zip".

data.name: ExportNoSelection
data.value: You must select at least one file.

data.name: AutoBackupModeHelp
data.value: - Simple mode: save slots are backed up "as is" with no compression; ideal for syncing data with tablet/PC but does not protect from accidental overwriting of data. - Rotating mode: save slots are compressed, multiple save files are kept to prevent accidental overwritting of data; ideal for safe guard of data.

data.name: BackupFailOnedriveText
data.value: Auto backup fail, please sign in to OneDrive.

data.name: BackupLastManualSlotText
data.value: Back up most recent manual save slot

data.name: AutoBackupNote
data.value: Note: Auto backup is triggered when users return to the main page after playing a game.

data.name: BackupOnlyWifiText
data.value: Only backup when Wifi is available (checking for this may be slow)

data.name: LinkingNote
data.value: Note: Turn off frameskip and turbo mode to prevent communication error.

data.name: FailDownloadCheatDataText
data.value: Failed to obtain data from supercheats.com.

data.name: TapToReturnText
data.value: Tap here to return to cheat list.

data.name: UseAccentBackgroundText
data.value: Use system accent color for main tile

data.name: UnpinTilePromptText
data.value: Please unpin/repin the tile for the change to take effect.

data.name: CheatWrongVersionText
data.value: Cheat code {0} is for rom {1} while the current rom is {2}. It will not work and may cause problems. This happens mostly because you are using a EU cheat code with a US rom or vice versa.

data.name: VibrationDurationErrorText
data.value: Vibration duration has to be between 0 and 5 seconds

data.name: RestorePurchaseNotice
data.value: ATTENTION - WP8.1 USERS: If your purchased features got deactivated, just tap on Purchase and enter your Wallet code if necessary, you will be able to restore your purchase without having to pay again.

data.name: ManualSnapshotHelp
data.value: If you store the app on SD Card, check this option to improve performance when exiting game. Also check this option if you want to create your own cover art.

data.name: SaveSlotReservedText
data.value: This save slot is reserved for internal use. You can only load from but cannot save to this slot.

data.name: FullPressButtonStickText
data.value: Camera full press makes A/B/L/R stick

data.name: CalibrateInstruction
data.value: Instruction: hold the phone at the desired rest postion and press the "Calibrate" button.

data.name: FailedToCalibrateText
data.value: Failed to calibrate. Please try hitting the button again.

data.name: CompassMissingText
data.value: Your device does have a compass or an accelerometer (most likely a compass).

data.name: EnableTurboPromptText
data.value: Do you want to enable TURBO mode for faster game play? You can later change the setting by going to Settings -> Video or press the camera button.

data.name: AccelerometerMissingText
data.value: Your device does not have an accelerometer.

data.name: GyroMissingText
data.value: Your device does not have a gyroscope.

data.name: ConfirmResetText
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset the game (equivalent to turn the console ON/OFF)
